title: Draven: TransFormers Crossover.  I made ring announcer Draven into a figure!

embed.description: He's on ebay as well at http://www.ebay.com/itm/262107733530 Autobots transform and roll out to the league of Draven. Not Draven, Draaaaven. Right of out summoners rift the marksman with the spinning axes is ready to take down even the most dangerous Decepticon combiners.

body:
Been working on a few League Transformers.  This is the first one done.  3d Printed axes courtesy of Fakebuster83 on shapeways and quite a few Riot support employees helped me out as well.  Thanks for looking!
  {{champion:119}}

replies.body: Autobots don't want him and Megatron's afraid he'd take over.
